    • Constructor Detail

      • ScalarBar

        public ScalarBar(ColorLookupTable lookupTable,
         boolean editable)
        Ctor
        Parameters:
        lookupTable - - the ColorLookupTable that should be displayed.
        editable - - If true there will be marks drawn for every entry in the lookuptable. These marks can be moved with the mouse. This modification directly moves the value within the ColorLookupTable. As a result the ColorLookupTable will be modified.
